author: ParkerIzing
title: Kinda meh
review:
Why this is LEGO?

Box/Instructions

Easy to follow instructions

Parts

Too much concrete parts, you can assemble a bike, or a bike a good deal of spares, it's fun how the old pneumatic T distributors are the bike stands

Minifigures

A new (at the time) design policeman, helmet with visor, only one face, leather pants and jacket. Also a walkie transmitter is included

The build

Much simplified, you assemble the frame and the body of the bike, 2 parts and got the 80% done, stickers are nice.

 

The completed model

Looks awesome, even if it's quite big for a bike, I suppose it's a BMW kind of bike.

 

Overall opinion

I liked it, even if simple (it's my most modern set, and already assembled +1000 part models) looks nice and is a cheap and neat addition for a city.

author: Mask_of_Control
title: AMAZING
review:
I had already done this review for the 2005 version of the set, with this review being the same as the first one because in this new version of this set the only change is the color of the stickers.

Although the set is small, it has a good minifigure and a good vehicle.

PROS

Good little figure

Good vehicle

CONS

Nothing

This was my first set and it was him who made me know LEGO.
It is a very good set to add to a collection and to a city.
It may be small but the design is good as is the minifigure which is my favorite minifigure of LEGO.

I highly recommend buying this set.
